description: An unknown error occurred in the server. It is confirmed that your latest request has failed.
solutions: If the error persists, contact the maintainer of this site

description: Your request could not be processed because an existing resource already exists.
Your request could not be processed because the input received does not satisfy criteria
solutions: Change your request to meet the requirement and re-submit

description: Your credentials could not be validated therefore your identity was not authenticated
Your request could not be processed because your input data is invalid.
solutions: Check your query params if GET and form entries if POST
If the error persists, contact the maintainer of this site

description: Your do not have permission for the request
The request resource is not found in the server
solutions: Scan disk for virus an Trojan
Contact the maintainer of the website

description: The server could not process your request because an unsupported HTTP method was used.
solutions: If the error persists, contact the maintainer of this site
